channel.title: Im and idiot when it comes to servers
channel.description:
But i need to know stuff
ok so i followed the steps in the create your own private server thing in the tut section and ive got a source, but how do i make it so that the client is running the files from my source? like so that my client is getting the data from my source, also if this gets accomplished, how could i make new shops and add them into my server?

item.title: Im and idiot when it comes to servers

item.description:
@Orngequirrel wrote:

errr, i shouldnt listen to myself? okay hah.

anyways how do i find the gui thing? and im using crazyfaze scape 317 source

item.description:

you needs to make sure his clientâ€™s gui is set to his no-ip or hamachi if he uses it and then he just has to click runserver. i can help you with the shops whats your source. and dont listen to orngequirrel he doesnt know what hes talking about

item.title: Im and idiot when it comes to servers
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

go to the source and on the auto reseter if you got one put 90mintues and then press ok and it will run server and open the client after you do that. If you dont have auto reseter then go to run on the source and then open the client.

Read full topic
